comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Labeled 2609-1, which may imply that this of Blackfeet, since 2609-2 is www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3029424179/ and of a Blackfoot chief from Montana.

comment.author: 34390004@N07
comment._content: Would I be able to use this for an upcoming Aboriginal docudrama? We are looking for free photopgraphs because we need close to 1600, and this picture would be of great help. If you need more information please let me know
